explains: adj. 空想的，无实际经验的；夸夸其谈的

sentences.en: I sank down into a voluminous armchair.
sentences.cn: 我一下子坐在了宽大的扶手椅里。

sentences.en: He was lying sprawled in an armchair, watching TV.
sentences.cn: 他四肢伸开正懒散地靠在扶手椅上看电视。

sentences.en: She led him to an armchair, with her arm round his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她把他领到扶手椅上，手臂搂住了他的肩膀。
